channel.title: Need help with my server. @@#@#
channel.description:
OK so, i got my no-ip, im on a laptop so i portforwarded, and i opened the port in my firewall. I can get on the server with localhost, but other people cant get on it. What did i do wrong?
And do i have to have a static IP or dynamic, or it doesnt matter?

item.title: Need help with my server. @@#@#
item.dc:creator: @CosmoruleS CosmoruleS
